CustomField.formula: CASE(Subject, "Bienvenido/a a Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Gracias por tu solicitud de adhesión - tus datos están siendo comprobados", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Muchas gracias por registrarte", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),2,0), "Felicidades, ya estás registrado/a", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Te damos la bienvenida. Empieza con Trusted Shops ahora", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Te damos la bienvenida a Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Enhorabuena: tu adhesión traerá más servicios", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "Enhorabuena: tu adhesión traerá más dominios", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "Estamos siempre a tu disposición:tu contacto personal en Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), "Conoce a nuestro equipo", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), 0)
CustomField.label: Application Subject ES
